content.query:
select top (10) from bikehire_db

WITH MarchData AS (
    SELECT
        PULocationID,
        DATEPART(week, tpep_pickup_datetime) AS week_number,
        AVG(trip_speed) OVER () AS avg_speed
    FROM [dbo].[bikehire_db]
    WHERE
        YEAR(tpep_pickup_datetime) = 2021
        AND MONTH(tpep_pickup_datetime) = 3
        group by PULocationID, tpep_pickup_datetime, trip_speed
)
SELECT TOP 5
    PULocationID,
    week_number,
    RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY week_number ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS rank
FROM MarchData
WHERE trip_speed < avg_speed
ORDER BY week_number, rank;

drop table bikehire
